title: Family members identify female civilian victim of Planned Parenthood shooting
content:
One of the two civilian victims killed in Friday's attack on the Colorado Springs Planned Parenthood was Jennifer Markovsky, according to relatives who spoke with the Hawaiian television station Hawaii News Now.
Markovsky was 1997 graduate of Waianae High School on the island of O'ahu, according to family members who spoke with Hawaii News Now. Markovsky's relatives have taken to Facebook to express their grief.
